duties_responsibilities.duty: Process semi-monthly payroll and address inaccuracies.
Manage retirement fund enrollment and deductions.
Audit health benefit options for employees and company savings.
Assist with health benefit enrollment and deductions.
Monitor health coverage billing and administer COBRA.
Handle compliance tasks and internal investigations.
Support HRIS system and Learning Management System.
Ensure policy compliance for performance and discipline.
Maintain Harassment Prevention Training and CPR certification compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or a related field (Master's preferred)
